title: Washington Journal: Dr. William Schaffner Discusses Covid-19 Pandemic& Vaccines
description: Dr. William Schaffner, a Vanderbilt University infectious disease professor, talked about the latest developments in the coronavirus pandemic response and COVID-19 vaccines.
